SEARCH
Package com.dua3.utility.crypt

Class PasswordUtil

java.lang.Object
com.dua3.utility.crypt.PasswordUtil
public final class PasswordUtil extends Object
Utility class for password analysis and generation.

Provides a set of methods for evaluating password strength, calculating its characteristics, identifying potential weaknesses, and generating secure random passwords.

  • Method Details

    • evaluatePasswordStrength

      public static PasswordUtil.PasswordStrength evaluatePasswordStrength(char[] password)
      Evaluates the entropy and strength of a password.

      This method calculates the Shannon entropy of the password and provides a comprehensive strength assessment based on multiple factors including character set diversity, length, and common patterns.

      Parameters:
      password - the password to evaluate
      Returns:
      a PasswordUtil.PasswordStrength object containing entropy and strength information

    • generatePassword

      public static char[] generatePassword()
      Generates a random password with default length of 20 characters. The password uses printable ASCII characters (33-126) providing 128 bits of entropy.
      Returns:
      a randomly generated secure password

    • generatePassword

      public static char[] generatePassword(int length)
      Generates a random password of specified length.

      The password is created using securely generated random characters from the printable ASCII character set (characters 33-126, total of 94 characters). Each character provides approximately 6.5392 bits of entropy. To create a password with a strength equivalent to n random bits, choose a length of at least ⌈n / 6.5392⌉ characters.

      For common security levels:

      • 64-bit security: at least 10 characters
      • 80-bit security: at least 13 characters
      • 128-bit security: at least 20 characters
      Parameters:
      length - the length of the password to be generated. Must be at least 8.
      Returns:
      a character array representing the randomly generated password
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the specified length is less than 8
      IllegalStateException - if a secure password cannot be generated after 10 attempts
